brand.name: Digital Work
brand.description: Premium logo animations & 3D intro videos. Transform your brand with stunning visual effects.

hero.headline: Bring Your Logo to Life
hero.subheadline: Premium custom logo animations crafted by professional motion designers. Stand out with stunning 3D intros.

items.name: Sarah Mitchell
items.review: Absolutely stunning animation! My clients are blown away by the quality. The turnaround time was incredibly fast and the team was very responsive.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.review: Best investment for my brand. The 3D intro video looks incredibly professional and really sets my content apart from the competition.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.review: Amazing quality and super fast delivery. I ordered the fire explosion effect and it exceeded all my expectations. Highly recommend!

benefits.title: Stand Out

benefits.description: Professional-grade animations created with industry-standard tools and techniques.

benefits.title: 200+ Effects
benefits.description: Choose from a vast library of animation styles including fire, neon, 3D, particles, and more.

benefits.title: Commercial License
benefits.description: Full commercial rights included. Use your animation anywhere without restrictions.
